skill.name: agent.skills.primitives.StayClose
skill.description: For the agent, to stay close to a set of given entities. By issuing a set of entities and positions, the agent will choose the best position to go to. The agent activates a "move to" action with a priority depending on the efficiency of each position to get close to each entity.

parameter.name: entities
parameter.description: The set of elements to stay close to.

parameter.name: positions
parameter.description: The positions to use to stay close to the elements. If no positions issued, the skill calls the query "getPositionsToStayClose()" with the given "entities" as parameters.

link.name: observe
link.description: To enact the decision to orientate sensors toward the entities.

link.name: moveAndTakePosition
link.description: To enact the decision to move to the chosen position.
